title: I know its probably just my connection
body:
But is anyone else getting really bad lag?

It lags like crazy but I simply leave the game reconnect and it fixes it.

replies.body: Maybe you have other tabs/programs open that are killing bandwidth/ram. Like I close youtube, my music player, bluestacks and I stop lagging

I am lagging lately as well. pingtest.net and speedtest.net is telling me my connection is fine.

Everything else is loading fine. It's been happening for two days now.
